e.Facades

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • e.Facades.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    A Facade which contains all methods that can be executed by the CUSTOMER user. Any instance represents a single CUSTOMER, that can execute the methods by this object, whose given by the login method when correct parameters are given to it.
    This class implements CouponClientFacade. The CUSTOMER Facade is part of the Facades layer which enables the users to handle their information.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public static CustomerFacade login(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String Password)
                            throws DAOException
        Only by login with correct parameters you can get a CustomerFacade object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the customer.
        Password - The password of the customer.
        Returns:
        customer with these parameters if exists.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When customer with the given parameters does not exists.

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                    throws DAOException
        Perform a customer client purchase of coupon by changing the relevant data on database.
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon to purchase.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When coupon doesn't exist, current customer already purchased this coupon, coupon out of stock or connection failed.

      • getAllPurchases

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchases()
                                             throws DAOException
        Get all coupons bought by the current customer.
        Returns:
        A collection of coupons which the current customer bought.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • getAllPurchasesByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchasesByType(CouponType type)
                                                   throws DAOException
        Get all coupons bought by the current customer, matching a specific coupon type.
        Parameters:
        type - The coupon type to filter coupons by.
        Returns:
        A collection of coupons bought by the current customer, matching the given coupon type.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • getAllPurchasesByMaxPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchasesByMaxPrice(double maxPrice)
                                                       throws DAOException
        Get all coupons bought by the current customer, which their price is not more than the given price.
        Parameters:
        maxPrice - The maximum price of which to filter coupon by.
        Returns:
        A collection of coupons bought by current customer, with price which doesn't exceeds the given maximum price.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.
